product_name: All Terrain Herbal Armor Spray Insect Repellent
long_description: All-natural Herbal Armor(TM) Insect Repellent spray is perfect for hard-core enthusiasts who demand effectiveness, but don't want DEET. Unique formula contains five natural essential oils recognized by the EPA as repellents. Clinically proven to be 100% effective for more than two hours, 95.8% effective for three hours and 77.1% effective for four hours. Protects against mosquitoes, ticks, gnats, flies, ants, black flies and other pesky insects. Convenient spray formula is sweat- and water-resistant and non-greasy. Natural ingredients won't damage or fade fabric or equipment.
short_description: All-natural Herbal Armor(TM) Insect Repellent spray is perfect for hard-core enthusiasts who demand effectiveness, but don't want DEET.
